title: want to hire font maker
content:
Hi all...

i starting working on fonts again and my right arm is toast!, from wrist to elbow...  
I am looking to sub out my basic font needs to someone font maker . ( i already have clean vectors!)  
they can email me direct if they want . [signdna@gmail.com](mailto:signdna@gmail.com)  
-dave
author: clearity
